name: pj-projects
title: PJ
description: Display a project picker of all the projects on your system and lets you open one
author: josephschmitt

commands.name: quick-switch
commands.title: Quick Switch
commands.description: Quickly switch to a project with instant search

commands.name: search-projects
commands.title: Search Projects
commands.description: Advanced search with filtering by type and last modified

preferences.name: pjPath
preferences.title: PJ Binary Path
preferences.description: Path to the pj binary. Leave empty to use 'pj' from PATH.

preferences.name: defaultAction
preferences.title: Default Action
preferences.description: The primary action when pressing Enter on a project

preferences.name: editorApp
preferences.title: Editor Application
preferences.description: The editor application to open projects in (e.g., Visual Studio Code, Cursor, Zed)

preferences.name: terminalApp
preferences.title: Terminal Application
preferences.description: The terminal application to open projects in (e.g., Terminal, iTerm, Warp)

scripts.prepublishOnly:
echo "

It seems like you are trying to publish the Raycast extension to npm.

If you did intend to publish it to npm, remove the \`prepublishOnly\` script and rerun \`npm publish\` again.
If you wanted to publish it to the Raycast Store instead, use \`npm run publish\` instead.

" && exit 1
